TextRun.Label: total_page_count
TextRun.Value: = IIf ( CountRows("order_id_group") <= Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage(Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!coupon_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!setpromotion_option_enabled.Value,Fields!mall_kbn.Value,Fields!gift_flg.Value) , "" , "1/"+ ( Int ( ( CountRows("order_id_group") + ( Code.m_iMaxRows - Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows ) + ( Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows - Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage(Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!coupon_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!setpromotion_option_enabled.Value,Fields!mall_kbn.Value,Fields!gift_flg.Value) ) - 1 )/Code.m_iMaxRows ) + 1 ).ToString() )
Paddingの値を動的に変化させて高さを調節するテキストボックス →
※1ptの半角スペースが入っています →

TextRun.Label: total_page_number
TextRun.Value:
=Int(( CountRows("order_id_group") + ( Code.m_iMaxRows - Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows ) + ( Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows - Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage(Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!coupon_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!setpromotion_option_enabled.Value,Fields!mall_kbn.Value,Fields!gift_flg.Value) ) - 1 )/Code.m_iMaxRows) + 1
' ページ数 = (データ行数+(最大行数-最初のページの最大行数)+合計行-1)/20 + 1

TextRun.Label: order_price_shipping
TextRun.Value: =IIF((Fields!order_shipping_no.Value <> Fields!shipping_no_max.Value), "Described on the last sheet", Fields!order_price_shipping.Value)

複数配送注文の場合、最後の配送先のページに表示
=IIF(Parameters!management_included_tax_flag.Value = false, "Total order products (excluding tax)", "Order total product (tax included)")

TextRun.Label: order_price_subtotal
TextRun.Value: =IIF((Fields!order_shipping_no.Value <> Fields!shipping_no_max.Value), "Described on the last sheet", Fields!order_price_subtotal.Value)
セットプロモーションOPが有効な場合表示される行
ポイントOPが有効な場合表示される行
会員ランクOPかつ定期OPが有効な場合表示される行
自社・楽天注文であり、
会員ランクOPが有効な場合表示される行
自社・楽天注文であり、
クーポンOPが有効な場合表示される行
定期購入の場合表示される行
=IIF((Fields!order_shipping_no.Value <> Fields!shipping_no_max.Value), "Described on the last sheet", Fields!order_price_tax.Value)

TextRun.Label: order_price_total

TextRun.Value: =IIF((Fields!order_shipping_no.Value <> Fields!shipping_no_max.Value), "Described on the last sheet", Fields!relation_memo.Value)
モール系の場合に表示される行

Style.PaddingBottom: =(2.09958 * ( IIf ( (Int(( RowNumber("order_id_group") + ( Code.m_iMaxRows - Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows ) + ( Code.m_iMaxFirstPageRows - Code.GetMinRowCountUntilFirstChangingPage(Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!coupon_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!setpromotion_option_enabled.Value,Fields!mall_kbn.Value,Fields!gift_flg.Value) ) - 1 )/Code.m_iMaxRows ) + 1) = 1 , 0 , Code.m_iMaxRows - Code.GetNumberOfLastChangingPage(CountRows("order_id_group"),Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!coupon_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value,Parameters!setpromotion_option_enabled.Value,Fields!mall_kbn.Value,Fields!gift_flg.Value) )) ).ToString()+"cm"

TextRun.Value: Information about the points you have (as of
Up to 10 limited time points have been output, you can check all from My Page.
Provisional points can’t be used until they are converted to Available points after period of time.

=(Code.IsDisplayOwnSiteOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), ((Parameters!member_rank_option_enabled.Value And Parameters!fixed_purchase_option_enabled.Value) = False))) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」
=(Code.IsDisplayOptionArea(Code.GetMallKbn(Fields!mall_kbn.Value), Parameters!point_option_enabled.Value) = False) '返り値がFalseの場合「表示」
